int TInterface::SetStatus (  int  Status  ) 
 

Set Windows Status 

00113 {    
00114   switch(Status) {
00115   case STATUS_GET:
00116     wattron(pPlayWin, COLOR_PAIR(BLACK_ON_YELLOW) | A_BOLD);
00117     mvwprintw(pPlayWin, 2, 12,  "g.e.t.t.i.n.g  ");
00118     wnoutrefresh(pPlayWin);
00119     break;
00120   case STATUS_PLAY:
00121     wattron(pPlayWin, COLOR_PAIR(WHITE_ON_GREEN) | A_BOLD);
00122     mvwprintw(pPlayWin, 2, 12,  "p.l.a.y.i.n.g  ");
00123     wnoutrefresh(pPlayWin);
00124     break;
00125   case STATUS_SLEEP:
00126     wattron(pPlayWin, COLOR_PAIR(WHITE_ON_BLACK) | A_BOLD);
00127     mvwprintw(pPlayWin, 2, 12,  "s.l.e.e.p.i.n.g");
00128     wnoutrefresh(pPlayWin);
00129     break;
00130   case STATUS_STOP:  
00131     wattron(pRecWin, COLOR_PAIR(MAGENTA_ON_BLACK) | A_BOLD);
00132     mvwprintw(pRecWin, 2, 12,  "s.t.o.p          ");
00133     wnoutrefresh(pRecWin);
00134     break;
00135   case STATUS_REC:
00136     wattron(pRecWin, COLOR_PAIR(WHITE_ON_RED) | A_BOLD);
00137     mvwprintw(pRecWin, 2, 12,  "r.e.c.o.r.d.i.n.g");
00138     wnoutrefresh(pRecWin);
00139     break;
00140   default: ;
00141   }
00142   doupdate();
00143   return Status;
00144 }
